channel.title: Rebol3 downloads and changes
channel.description:
Build [c712df7](https://github.com/metaeducation/ren-c/commit/c712df7) on 17-May-2017/22:15:10Z is now available for download. Please use debug builds and report issues. No warranty of fitness is implied.These are the direct links for [OSX x64](http://metaeducation.s3.amazonaws.com/travis-builds/0.2.40/r3-c712df7), [Win x64](http://metaeducation.s3.amazonaws.com/travis-builds/0.3.40/r3-c712df7-debug-cpp.exe), [Linux x64](http://metaeducation.s3.amazonaws.com/travis-builds/0.4.40/r3-c712df7), and [Android-arm](http://metaeducation.s3.amazonaws.com/travis-builds/0.13.2/r3-c712df7).
BLANK! vs. error for `read dns://` when network works, but not found This changes the READ DNS:// behavior to give errors when a truly exceptional network problem happens, but to give blanks when a lookup connects to the name server but just fails.
It also gets rid of the asynchronous DNS lookup code on Windows. The relevant API calls were not carried forward with IPv6, and are thus deprecated. Microsoft "urges" that the more standard/POSIX network API be used with a thread if this capability is desired.

item.title: Rebol3 downloads and changes
item.dc:creator: gchiu
item.description:
Build c712df7 on 17-May-2017/22:15:10Z is now available for download. Please use debug builds and report issues. No warranty of fitness is implied.These are the direct links for OSX x64, Win x64, Linux x64, and Android-arm.

BLANK! vs. error for read dns:// when network works, but not found
This changes the READ DNS:// behavior to give errors when a truly
exceptional network problem happens, but to give blanks when a lookup
connects to the name server but just fails.

It also gets rid of the asynchronous DNS lookup code on Windows. The
relevant API calls were not carried forward with IPv6, and are thus
deprecated. Microsoft "urges" that the more standard/POSIX network API
be used with a thread if this capability is desired.

Read full topic
